properties.name: stubrunner.amqp.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable support for Stub Runner and AMQP.

properties.name: stubrunner.amqp.mockCOnnection
properties.description: Whether to enable support for Stub Runner and AMQP mocked connection factory.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.consul.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable stubs registration in Consul.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.delegate.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable DiscoveryClient's Stub Runner implementation.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Spring Cloud support for Stub Runner.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.eureka.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable stubs registration in Eureka.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.loadbalancer.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner's Spring Cloud Load Balancer integration.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.stubbed.discovery.enabled
properties.description: Whether Service Discovery should be stubbed for Stub Runner. If set to false, stubs will get registered in real service discovery.

properties.name: stubrunner.cloud.zookeeper.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable stubs registration in Zookeeper.

properties.name: stubrunner.integration.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Spring Integration.

properties.name: stubrunner.stream.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Spring Cloud Stream.

properties.name: stubrunner.jms.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Spring JMS.

properties.name: stubrunner.kafka.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable Stub Runner integration with Spring Kafka.

properties.name: stubrunner.kafka.initializer.enabled
properties.description: Whether to allow Stub Runner to take care of polling for messages instead of the KafkaStubMessages component. The latter should be used only on the producer side.
